segments.text: I notice the indoor kitchen with its everyday setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area has water running from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the basin and overflowing onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman faces away, handling a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet touches the forming puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets are open above the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A cookie jar sits inside one of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy uses a step stool to reach it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand while grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, a neat garden is visible.
segments.speaker: PAR
